mapper.select: select count(id) from z_airdata
select DISTINCT Flt_Nbr from guestrate
select DISTINCT air_line from instructions
select SUM(Pgs_Per_Cls) from z_airdata
select SUM(Pgs_Per_Cls) from z_airdata
select SUM(Pgs_Per_Cls) from z_airdata

select Lcl_Dpt_Day date, SUM(Pgs_Per_Cls) persons from z_airdata
group by Lcl_Dpt_Day

select Lcl_Dpt_Day date, SUM(Tal_Nbr) zsr from z_airdata a where a.Flt_Rte_Cd in (select Flt_Rte_Cd from (select * from z_airdata
GROUP BY Flt_Rte_Cd) as t) AND Lcl_Dpt_Day>=#{startTime} AND Lcl_Dpt_Day<=#{endTime} group by Lcl_Dpt_Day

select SUM(Pgs_Per_Cls)/SUM(Tal_Nbr_Set) kzl,Flt_Nbr flyNum from z_airdata
group by Flt_Nbr order by kzl ASC limit 10

select SUM(Set_Ktr_Ine)/count(id) zgl ,Flt_Nbr flyNum from z_airdata a where a.Flt_Rte_Cd in (select Flt_Rte_Cd from (select * from z_airdata
GROUP BY Flt_Rte_Cd) as t) AND Lcl_Dpt_Day=#{date} group by Flt_Nbr order by zgl ASC limit 10

select SUM(Tal_Nbr) zsr,Flt_Nbr flyNum from z_airdata a where a.Flt_Rte_Cd in (select Flt_Rte_Cd from (select * from z_airdata
GROUP BY Flt_Rte_Cd) as t) AND Lcl_Dpt_Day=#{date} group by Flt_Nbr order by zsr ASC limit 10
select air_line flt_ret_cd,flt_nbr flyNum,state state from airlineCompany

select flt_nbr flyNum,air_line flt_ret_cd from airlineCompany
group by flt_nbr,flt_ret_cd
select city from z_airport_city where airportNum like CONCAT('%','${szm}','%' )

select Lcl_Dpt_Day from z_airdata
order by Lcl_Dpt_Day DESC limit 1
select Flt_Nbr from z_airdata where Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%','${airPort}','%' ) and Lcl_Dpt_Day=#{date} group by Flt_Nbr

select id as id, Lcl_Dpt_Day as lcl_Dpt_Day, Dpt_AirPt_Cd as dpt_AirPt_Cd, Arrv_Airpt_Cd as arrv_Airpt_Cd, Flt_Nbr as flt_Nbr, Cpy_Nm as cpy_Nm, Lcl_Dpt_Tm as lcl_Dpt_Tm, Lcl_Arrv_Tm as lcl_Arrv_Tm, Flt_Rte_Cd as flt_Rte_Cd, Tal_Nbr_Set as tal_Nbr_Set, Pgs_Per_Cls as pgs_Per_Cls, Grp_Nbr as grp_Nbr, Ech_Cls_Grp as ech_Cls_Grp, Grp_Fng_Rte as grp_Fng_Per, Tal_Nbr as totalNumber, Set_Ktr_Ine as Set_Ktr_Ine, Grp_Ine as grp_Ine, Grp_Ppt as grp_Ppt, Egs_Lod_Fts as egs_Lod_Fts, avg_Dct as avg_Dct, Idd_Dct as idd_Dct, Grp_Dct as grp_Dct, Two_Tak_Ppt as two_Tak_Ppt, Ful_Pce_Ppt as ful_Pce_Ppt, Nne_Dnt_Ppt as nne_Dnt_Ppt, Eht_Five_Dnt_Ppt as eht_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Eht_Dnt_Ppt as eht_Dnt_Ppt, Sen_Five_Dnt_Ppt as sen_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Sen_Dnt_Ppt as sen_Dnt_Ppt, Six_Five_Dnt_Ppt as six_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Six_Dnt_Ppt as six_Dnt_Ppt, Fve_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fve_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fur_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fur_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fur_Dnt_Ppt as fur_Dnt_Ppt, Thr_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as thr_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Thr_Dnt_Ppt as thr_Dnt_Ppt, Two_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as two_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Two_Dnt_Ppt as two_Dnt_Ppt, Sal_Tak_Ppt as sal_Tak_Ppt, R_Tak_Ppt as r_Tak_Ppt, U_Tak_Ppt as u_Tak_Ppt, I_Tak_Ppt as i_Tak_Ppt, Z_Tak_Ppt as z_Tak_Ppt, E_Tak_Ppt as e_Tak_Ppt, A_Tak_Ppt as a_Tak_Ppt, O_Tak_Ppt as o_Tak_Ppt, S_Tak_Ppt as s_Tak_Ppt, H_Tak_Ppt as h_Tak_Ppt, X_Tak_Ppt as x_Tak_Ppt, Children as children, yBFare as yBFare, sailingDistance as sailingDistance, Dta_Sce as dta_Sce, Dta_Dte as dta_Dte, company_id as company from z_airdata where Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%','${airPort}','%' ) and Lcl_Dpt_Day=#{date}

select id as id, Lcl_Dpt_Day as lcl_Dpt_Day, Dpt_AirPt_Cd as dpt_AirPt_Cd, Arrv_Airpt_Cd as arrv_Airpt_Cd, Flt_Nbr as flt_Nbr, Cpy_Nm as cpy_Nm, Lcl_Dpt_Tm as lcl_Dpt_Tm, Lcl_Arrv_Tm as lcl_Arrv_Tm, Flt_Rte_Cd as flt_Rte_Cd, Tal_Nbr_Set as tal_Nbr_Set, Pgs_Per_Cls as pgs_Per_Cls, Grp_Nbr as grp_Nbr, Ech_Cls_Grp as ech_Cls_Grp, Grp_Fng_Rte as grp_Fng_Per, Tal_Nbr as totalNumber, Set_Ktr_Ine as Set_Ktr_Ine, Grp_Ine as grp_Ine, Grp_Ppt as grp_Ppt, Egs_Lod_Fts as egs_Lod_Fts, avg_Dct as avg_Dct, Idd_Dct as idd_Dct, Grp_Dct as grp_Dct, Two_Tak_Ppt as two_Tak_Ppt, Ful_Pce_Ppt as ful_Pce_Ppt, Nne_Dnt_Ppt as nne_Dnt_Ppt, Eht_Five_Dnt_Ppt as eht_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Eht_Dnt_Ppt as eht_Dnt_Ppt, Sen_Five_Dnt_Ppt as sen_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Sen_Dnt_Ppt as sen_Dnt_Ppt, Six_Five_Dnt_Ppt as six_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Six_Dnt_Ppt as six_Dnt_Ppt, Fve_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fve_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fur_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fur_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fur_Dnt_Ppt as fur_Dnt_Ppt, Thr_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as thr_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Thr_Dnt_Ppt as thr_Dnt_Ppt, Two_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as two_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Two_Dnt_Ppt as two_Dnt_Ppt, Sal_Tak_Ppt as sal_Tak_Ppt, R_Tak_Ppt as r_Tak_Ppt, U_Tak_Ppt as u_Tak_Ppt, I_Tak_Ppt as i_Tak_Ppt, Z_Tak_Ppt as z_Tak_Ppt, E_Tak_Ppt as e_Tak_Ppt, A_Tak_Ppt as a_Tak_Ppt, O_Tak_Ppt as o_Tak_Ppt, S_Tak_Ppt as s_Tak_Ppt, H_Tak_Ppt as h_Tak_Ppt, X_Tak_Ppt as x_Tak_Ppt, Children as children, yBFare as yBFare, sailingDistance as sailingDistance, Dta_Sce as dta_Sce, Dta_Dte as dta_Dte, company_id as company from z_airdata
ORDER BY Flt_Nbr,Lcl_Dpt_Day ASC

select id as id, Lcl_Dpt_Day as lcl_Dpt_Day, Dpt_AirPt_Cd as dpt_AirPt_Cd, Arrv_Airpt_Cd as arrv_Airpt_Cd, Flt_Nbr as flt_Nbr, Cpy_Nm as cpy_Nm, Lcl_Dpt_Tm as lcl_Dpt_Tm, Lcl_Arrv_Tm as lcl_Arrv_Tm, Flt_Rte_Cd as flt_Rte_Cd, Tal_Nbr_Set as tal_Nbr_Set, Pgs_Per_Cls as pgs_Per_Cls, Grp_Nbr as grp_Nbr, Ech_Cls_Grp as ech_Cls_Grp, Grp_Fng_Rte as grp_Fng_Per, Tal_Nbr as totalNumber, Set_Ktr_Ine as Set_Ktr_Ine, Grp_Ine as grp_Ine, Grp_Ppt as grp_Ppt, Egs_Lod_Fts as egs_Lod_Fts, avg_Dct as avg_Dct, Idd_Dct as idd_Dct, Grp_Dct as grp_Dct, Two_Tak_Ppt as two_Tak_Ppt, Ful_Pce_Ppt as ful_Pce_Ppt, Nne_Dnt_Ppt as nne_Dnt_Ppt, Eht_Five_Dnt_Ppt as eht_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Eht_Dnt_Ppt as eht_Dnt_Ppt, Sen_Five_Dnt_Ppt as sen_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Sen_Dnt_Ppt as sen_Dnt_Ppt, Six_Five_Dnt_Ppt as six_Five_Dnt_Ppt, Six_Dnt_Ppt as six_Dnt_Ppt, Fve_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fve_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fur_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as fur_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Fur_Dnt_Ppt as fur_Dnt_Ppt, Thr_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as thr_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Thr_Dnt_Ppt as thr_Dnt_Ppt, Two_Fve_Dnt_Ppt as two_Fve_Dnt_Ppt, Two_Dnt_Ppt as two_Dnt_Ppt, Sal_Tak_Ppt as sal_Tak_Ppt, R_Tak_Ppt as r_Tak_Ppt, U_Tak_Ppt as u_Tak_Ppt, I_Tak_Ppt as i_Tak_Ppt, Z_Tak_Ppt as z_Tak_Ppt, E_Tak_Ppt as e_Tak_Ppt, A_Tak_Ppt as a_Tak_Ppt, O_Tak_Ppt as o_Tak_Ppt, S_Tak_Ppt as s_Tak_Ppt, H_Tak_Ppt as h_Tak_Ppt, X_Tak_Ppt as x_Tak_Ppt, Children as children, yBFare as yBFare, sailingDistance as sailingDistance, Dta_Sce as dta_Sce, Dta_Dte as dta_Dte, company_id as company, (SELECT Apt_Cha_Nm FROM airportmappingcode b WHERE b.IATA=a.Dpt_AirPt_Cd) dpt_Cha_Nm, (SELECT Apt_Cha_Nm FROM airportmappingcode b WHERE a.Arrv_Airpt_Cd=b.IATA) arrv_Cha_Nm from z_airdata a
ORDER BY Flt_Nbr,Lcl_Dpt_Day ASC
select id as id,city_name as cityName,city_coordinate as cityCoordinatee from t_city_coordinate

select Lcl_Dpt_Day from z_airdata
GROUP BY Lcl_Dpt_Day ORDER BY Lcl_Dpt_Day DESC

if.if: AND (Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ectq} or Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ecth}) AND (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd})

AND (Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ectq} or Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ecth}) AND ((Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{pas_stp}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{pas_stp} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}))
AND (Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ectq} or Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ecth}) AND ((Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))

AND (Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ectq} or Flt_Rte_Cd = #{flt_ecth}) AND ((Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{pas_stp}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{pas_stp} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{pas_stp} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{pas_stp}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))
AND ((Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ectq},'%' )) OR (Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ecth},'%' ))) AND (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd})

AND ((Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ectq},'%' )) OR (Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ecth},'%' ))) AND ((Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{pas_stp}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{pas_stp} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}))

AND ((Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ectq},'%' )) OR (Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ecth},'%' ))) AND ((Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))

AND ((Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ectq},'%' )) OR (Flt_Rte_Cd like CONCAT('%',#{flt_ecth},'%' ))) AND ((Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{pas_stp}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{pas_stp} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{pas_stp} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{pas_stp}) OR (Dpt_AirPt_Cd=#{Arrv_Airpt_Cd} and Arrv_Airpt_Cd=#{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))

where.if: AND (count_Set > 0 and count_Set is not NULL)
AND air_line LIKE CONCAT('%','${airPort}','%' ) AND itia = #{airPort}

mapper.select:
select count(DISTINCT Flt_Nbr) from z_airdata
GROUP BY Lcl_Dpt_Day
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Flt_Nbr) tme_Cla_Moh,SUM(Pgs_Per_Cls) tal_count, SUM(Tal_Nbr) tal_Ine,AVG(Egs_Lod_Fts)lod_For FROM z_airdata
